name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blync: Preview Links, Search & Turn Your AI Into an Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview links, search the web without leaving your current tab and turn your own AI into a personal assistant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Preview links directly in a popup without opening new tabs, search the web or ask your AI assistant — all while staying on the same page.

✨ Preview Links Instantly
Hover over or click on links to preview content in a sleek popup, without navigating away from your current tab. Save time and stay focused.

🔍 Search Smarter
Search the web directly from any page without opening a new tab. Highlight text or use the right-click menu to search with your preferred engine, all within a distraction-free interface.

🤖 Turn Your AI Into an Assistant
Use your favorite AI tools like ChatGPT or Gemini automated by Blync. Ask questions, get insights, or brainstorm ideas—all while staying on the same page.

❔Is it safe to use Blync?
Absolutely! Blync is 100% secure.
- It’s serverless and runs entirely within your browser.
- We don’t track, store, or access your data.
- Everything stays private and local.

❔Does Blync Link Preview work on all websites?
- Yes! Blync works seamlessly on any website.

❔Do I need an AI account to use the AI Assistant?
- Yes. Blync doesn’t provide AI services.
- Blync automates the process, making it faster and easier for you to access AI features.

❔What AI agents does Blync support?
- Currently, Blync supports: ChatGPT, Gemini and Claude

💡 Why Choose Blync?

Stay Focused: No more tab overload or switching between windows.
Boost Productivity: Access essential tools and information faster.
Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly with the tools you already love.
Whether you're working, learning, or just exploring the web, Blync keeps everything within reach and helps you stay in the flow.

➡️ Install Blync now and make every click count!
